title.rendered: Questions about the Legacy 2025 Capital Project? Try our Virtual Assistant

content.rendered:
Have questions about the Legacy 2025 Capital Project? Our chatbot is here to help! Whether you’re curious about construction timelines, tax impact, or what renovations will occur at each school, just type your question below and get quick, accurate answers.

To learn more about the proposed work, visit the Legacy 2025 Capital Project page.

excerpt.rendered: Have questions about the Legacy 2025 Capital Project? Our chatbot is here to help! Whether you’re curious about construction timelines, tax impact, or what renovations will occur at each school, just type your question below and get quick, accurate answers. ﻿﻿﻿ To learn more about the proposed work, visit the Legacy 2025 Capital Project page.
